CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: SIGA Technologies Inc is a commercial-stage pharmaceutical company focused on the health security market. The company's lead product is TPOXX, an orally administered antiviral drug for the treatment of human smallpox disease caused by the variola virus. Its products target orthopoxvirus infections including smallpox.

value.name: Tove C. Bolken
value.title: Senior VP-Operations & Chief Supply Chain Officer
